Comment.Language: For the Passover of Jonah in the standard tune:

Text.Language: Matoubon P[oic e~bolqen pi,~rof: n~te piatsem/r n~nicadokeoc: je anka] e~neks~v/ri: ouoh annah] e~tekmet[oic.
Purify us Lord! From the deviousness: of the unleavened of the Sadducees: for we understood Your wonders: and believed in Your Lordship.
طهرنا يارب من المكر الذي لخمير الصدوقيين لأننا فهمنا عجائبك وآمنا بربوبيتك.

Comment.Language: For the Passover of Jonah in the standard tune:

Text.Language: Je Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc mayamio nak n~q~r/i n~q/ten: n~ouervei n~te pekp~neuma eyouab: eu] doxologia nak.
Our Lord Jesus Christ, Create within us for you, a temple of Your Holy Spirit, so as to glorify You.
ياربنا يسوع المسيح اجعل لك فينا هيكلا لروحك القدوس لتمجيدك.
